name: NCAA Conference Realignment
description: R Shiny app I developed allowing users to create their own NCAA Division 1 conferences

name: NCAA Basketball Game Predictions
description: R Shiny app showing XGBoost generated predictions for every men's and women's game in 2021 NCAA season. (Model created with help of Tiffany Tseng, Tina Wang, Michael Mayor, and Brock Gallagher)

name: Relationship Between Demographics and 2016
description: Using linear models to explore relationship between county level demographics and voting outcomes in 2016 U.S. presidential election. (Model created with help of Tiffany Tseng, Tina Wang, Michael Mayor, and Brock Gallagher)
